name: Facebook Lead Ads Trigger
semantic_context: Handle Facebook Lead Ads events via webhooks
natural_language_description: 这是 Facebook Lead Ads Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Facebook Lead Ads events via webhooks

facebookLeadAdsNotice.displayName: Due to Facebook API limitations, you can use just one Facebook Lead Ads trigger for each Facebook App
facebookLeadAdsNotice.name: facebookLeadAdsNotice
facebookLeadAdsNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Due to Facebook API limitations, you can use just one Facebook Lead Ads trigger for each Facebook App

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 默认值: newLead | (必填项)

page.name: page
page.description: The page linked to the form for retrieving new leads
page.natural_language_description: 参数名: Page | 作用: The page linked to the form for retrieving new leads | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

form.name: form
form.description: The form to monitor for fetching lead details upon submission
form.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form | 作用: The form to monitor for fetching lead details upon submission | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: simplifyOutput (值: None) - Whether to return a simplified version of the webhook event instead of all fields
